sourcesContent:
List of Houses ({{viewTitle}})

Hous Id Category Location Rooms Area Renting Description
{{ item.ItemId }} {{ item.Category }} {{ item.Location }} {{ item.Rooms }} {{ item.Area }} {{ item.Renting | convertToCurrency: 'kr.'}} {{ item.Description }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-items-component', templateUrl: './items.component.html', styles: ['thead {color: blue,}'] }) export class ItemsComponent { viewTitle: string = 'Table'; displayImage: boolean = true; items: any[] = [ { "ItemId": 1, "Category": "House", "Location": "Drammen", "Rooms": 5, "Area": 145, "Renting": 15000, "Description": "Anew build", "ImageUrl": "assets/images/House1.jpg" }, { "ItemId": 2, "Category": "Department", "Location": "Oslo", "Rooms": 4, "Area": 130, "Renting": 16500, "Description": "Anew build", "ImageUrl": "assets/images/House2.jpg" } ]; toggleImage(): void { this.displayImage = !this.displayImage; } }
